info.title: AQAR API Documentation
info.description: Multi-tenant real estate management API with three authentication guards: Admin, User (Landlord/Tenant Owner), and Tenant User.

post.description: Authenticate an admin user and receive a bearer token
Revoke the current admin authentication token

get.description: Retrieve the authenticated admin profile with roles and permissions

post.description: Revoke current token and issue a new one
Request a password reset link via email. Always returns success to prevent email enumeration.

200.description: Password reset link sent (or not found, but same response for security)

message.example: If an account exists with this email, you will receive a password reset link.

post.description: Reset admin password using the token received via email

message.example: Password reset successfully. Please login with your new password.
The password confirmation does not match.

items.example: The password confirmation does not match.

post.description: Register a new end-user within a tenant. Requires tenant context via route parameter.

message.example: Registration successful. Please verify your email.

post.description: Authenticate a tenant end-user and receive bearer token
Revoke the current tenant user authentication token

get.description: Retrieve the authenticated tenant user profile

post.description: Revoke current token and issue a new one
Verify email address with code sent via email

200.description: Email verified successfully or already verified

post.description: Resend email verification code

200.description: Verification email sent or already verified

post.description: Request a password reset link via email. Always returns success to prevent email enumeration.

200.description: Password reset link sent (or not found, same response for security)

post.description: Reset tenant user password using the token received via email

400.description: Invalid or expired reset token or tenant context required

post.description: Register a new landlord/tenant owner user. Email verification required.

message.example: Registration successful. Please verify your email.
The email has already been taken.

post.description: Authenticate a landlord/tenant owner user and receive bearer token
Revoke the current user authentication token

get.description: Retrieve the authenticated user profile with tenants and payment info

post.description: Revoke current token and issue a new one
Verify user email address with code sent via email

200.description: Email verified successfully or already verified

post.description: Resend email verification code

200.description: Verification email sent or already verified

post.description: Request a password reset link via email. Always returns success to prevent email enumeration.

200.description: Password reset link sent (or not found, same response for security)

post.description: Reset user password using the token received via email
Login or register using social providers (Google/Facebook). Requires OAuth2 access token from provider.

is_new_user.description: Whether this is a new registration

400.description: Unable to retrieve email from provider

get.description: Get paginated list of all administrators with optional filters

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by name, email, or username

post.description: Create a new administrator account

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific administrator

message.example: You cannot delete your own account

put.description: Update the password of a specific administrator

get.description: Get paginated list of all price plans with features (admin view)

post.description: Create a new price plan with features

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific price plan with all features

delete.description: Delete a price plan and all its features

patch.description: Toggle the active/inactive status of a price plan
Reorder the features of a price plan

get.description: Get list of all roles with permissions count

post.description: Create a new role with permissions

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific role with all its permissions

put.description: Update an existing role and its permissions

delete.description: Delete a role. Protected roles (super-admin) cannot be deleted.

get.description: Get list of all available permissions, optionally grouped by module
Get paginated list of all support departments with ticket counts

post.description: Create a new support department

name: A department with this name already exists.

get.description: Retrieve a specific support department

delete.description: Delete a support department (only if no tickets exist)

message.example: Cannot delete department with existing tickets

get.description: Get paginated list of all support tickets with optional filters

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by title, subject, description, or user name/email

get.description: Retrieve a specific support ticket with all messages

put.description: Update ticket status, priority, assignee, or department

post.description: Add an admin reply to a support ticket
Close a support ticket

get.description: Get support ticket statistics (open, pending, closed counts)
Get all active price plans with features for public display
Get details of a specific plan by slug for purchase page
Get a comparison matrix of all active plans with feature availability

post.description: Check if a coupon code is valid for a plan

get.description: Get the authenticated user's currently active subscription
Get paginated subscription history for the authenticated user

post.description: Start the subscription flow. Returns payment options and a pending payment log.
Complete the subscription after successful payment
Cancel an active subscription
Create a renewal payment for an existing subscription
Upgrade current subscription to a new plan (prorated pricing)

404.description: No active subscription or plan not found

get.description: Get paginated list of the authenticated user's support tickets

post.description: Create a new support ticket

get.description: Retrieve a specific support ticket with all messages (only own tickets)

post.description: Add a reply to your own support ticket

message.example: Cannot reply to a closed ticket

post.description: Close your own support ticket

get.description: Get list of active support departments for ticket creation
Get all tenants/properties owned by the authenticated user

post.description: Create a new tenant/property. Database setup is asynchronous and may take a few moments.

subdomain.description: Unique subdomain identifier (lowercase, alphanumeric with hyphens)

201.description: Tenant created successfully (database setup in progress)

message.example: Tenant created. Database setup is in progress.

422.description: Validation error (subdomain taken, invalid plan, etc.)

message.example: Failed to create tenant: Database error

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific tenant owned by the authenticated user, including database status

404.description: Tenant not found or access denied

message.example: Tenant not found or access denied

put.description: Update settings of a specific tenant owned by the authenticated user

404.description: Tenant not found or access denied

message.example: Tenant not found or access denied

delete.description: Permanently delete a tenant and its database. This action cannot be undone.

404.description: Tenant not found or access denied

message.example: Tenant not found or access denied
Failed to delete tenant: Error details

post.description: Switch to a specific tenant context and receive a new token scoped to that tenant. Use this token to access tenant-specific resources.

200.description: Tenant context switched successfully - use the new token for tenant-specific requests

404.description: Tenant not found or access denied

message.example: Tenant not found or access denied

425.description: Too Early - Tenant database is not ready yet

message.example: Tenant database is not ready yet. Please wait.
Failed to switch tenant: Error details

get.description: Check if the tenant database has been created and is ready for use

404.description: Tenant not found or access denied

message.example: Tenant not found or access denied

post.description: Manually trigger tenant database setup. Use this if automatic setup failed or to retry database creation.

200.description: Database setup completed or already exists

404.description: Tenant not found or access denied

message.example: Tenant not found or access denied

get.description: Get paginated list of all landlord users with tenant info

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by name, email, username, or company

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific user with all tenants and payment history

delete.description: Deactivate a user by revoking all their tokens

post.description: Get a token to act as this user. Token expires in 2 hours.

get.description: Get paginated payment history for a specific user
Get user dashboard statistics including tenant count, active packages, and support tickets
Get the authenticated user's profile

post.description: Change the authenticated user's password. This will revoke all existing tokens.

message.example: Password changed successfully. Please login again.

get.description: Get list of all tenants owned by the authenticated user with status

post.description: Create a new tenant with plan selection. Database setup is asynchronous.

get.description: Get paginated list of support tickets created by the authenticated user
Get paginated payment history for the authenticated user
Retrieve information about the current tenant context including settings, package info, features, and expiration. This endpoint requires active tenant context.

features.description: Available features for this tenant based on active package

403.description: Tenant context not initialized or package expired

get.description: Check if the API is running and operational

name.description:
Store Admin Request DTO

Validates admin creation data.

Store Role Request DTO

Validates role creation data.

Update Admin Request DTO

Validates admin update data.

password.description:
Update Password Request DTO

Validates password update data.

name.description:
Update Profile Request DTO

Validates own profile update data.

Update Role Request DTO

Validates role update data.

feature_ids.description: Array of feature IDs in desired order

title.description:
Store Price Plan Request DTO

Validates data for creating a new price plan.

Update Price Plan Request DTO

Validates data for updating an existing price plan.

id.description: Feature ID for update, null for new

message.description:
Reply Request DTO

Validates ticket reply data.
message.example: Thank you for reaching out. We are looking into this issue.

name.description:
Store Department Request DTO

Validates support department creation/update data.

title.description:
Store Ticket Request DTO

Validates support ticket creation data.

description.example: I am unable to login to my dashboard. I keep getting an error message.

name.description:
Admin Update User Request DTO

Validates user update data when admin is updating a user.

old_password.description:
Change Password Request DTO

Validates password change data.

name.description:
Update Profile Request DTO

Validates user profile update data.

data.description:
Admin Collection Resource

Collection wrapper for admin resources with pagination metadata.

PricePlanCollection.title: Price Plan Collection
PricePlanCollection.description: Collection of price plans with summary

permissions.description: Permission limits (-1 for unlimited, null for not included)

message.example: Thank you for reaching out. We are working on your issue.

description.example: I cannot login to my account

data.description:
Tenant Collection Resource

Collection wrapper for tenant resources.

TenantUserResource.title: Tenant User Resource
TenantUserResource.description: Tenant user (end-user within a tenant) resource representation

data.description:
User Collection Resource

Collection wrapper for user resources with pagination metadata.

tenants_count.description:
User Dashboard Resource

Resource for user dashboard data.

sanctum_admin.description: Admin authentication token (Guard: api_admin). Use login endpoint to get token.

sanctum_user.description: User authentication token (Guard: api_user). Use login endpoint to get token.

sanctum_tenant_user.description: Tenant user authentication token (Guard: api_tenant_user). Use login endpoint to get token.

tags.name: Admin Authentication
tags.description: Authentication endpoints for platform administrators (Guard: api_admin)

tags.name: User Authentication
tags.description: Authentication endpoints for users/landlords/tenant owners (Guard: api_user)

tags.name: Tenant User Authentication
tags.description: Authentication endpoints for tenant users (Guard: api_tenant_user)

tags.name: Admin Management
tags.description: Admin user management endpoints (Guard: api_admin). Manage platform administrators.

tags.name: Price Plan Management (Admin)
tags.description: Admin endpoints to manage price plans and features (Guard: api_admin)

tags.name: Role Management
tags.description: Role and permission management endpoints (Guard: api_admin). Manage roles and their permissions.

tags.name: Admin Support Departments
tags.description: Support department management endpoints for administrators (Guard: api_admin)

tags.name: Admin Support Tickets
tags.description: Support ticket management endpoints for administrators (Guard: api_admin)

tags.name: Price Plans (Public)
tags.description: Public endpoints for viewing pricing plans and comparing features

tags.name: User Support Tickets
tags.description: Support ticket endpoints for users (Guard: api_user). Manage own support tickets.

tags.name: Tenant Management
tags.description: Tenant management endpoints for landlord users (Guard: api_user). Manage tenants/properties owned by the authenticated user.

tags.name: User Management (Admin)
tags.description: Admin endpoints to manage landlord users (Guard: api_admin). Manage tenant owners and their subscriptions.

tags.name: User Dashboard
tags.description: User self-service endpoints (Guard: api_user). Manage own profile, tenants, and view dashboard.

tags.name: Tenant Context
tags.description: Tenant context information endpoints. Access tenant-specific data and settings within the active tenant database.
